content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 6, FK Qarabag 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 6, FK Qarabag 0.
Attempt blocked. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Tiemoué Bakayoko.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
Wilde-Donald Guerrier (FK Qarabag) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Dino Ndlovu (FK Qarabag) left footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Míchel.

Foul by Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea).
Mahir Madatov (FK Qarabag) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Substitution, FK Qarabag. Mahir Madatov replaces Rasad Sadiqov.
